pack.simple_aether_cloud.mod.description: Simple Aether Cloud Mod Data Pack
block.simple_aether_cloud.yellow_cloud.d:
§aPrevents fall damage
§fCannot pass through block bottom
block.simple_aether_cloud.blue_cloud.des:
§aPrevents fall damage
§fLaunches entities in specified direction
§7Sneak to prevent launch and sink slowly
block.simple_aether_cloud.horizontal_blu:
§aPrevents fall damage
§fLaunches entities in specified direction
§7Sneak to prevent launch and sink slowly
block.simple_aether_cloud.red_cloud.desc:
§aPrevents fall damage
§cDeals damage to entities
§7Sneak to prevent damage
block.simple_aether_cloud.green_cloud.de:
§aPrevents fall damage
§aAccelerates entity growth
§aReduces breeding cooldown
§aAttracts nearby animals
§7Animals inside will periodically attempt to breed
config.simple_aether_cloud.blue_cloud.ve: The speed at which entities are launched upward
config.simple_aether_cloud.blue_cloud.mo: The number of particles spawned when an entity is moving through the cloud
config.simple_aether_cloud.blue_cloud.st: The number of particles spawned when an entity is static in the cloud
config.simple_aether_cloud.horizontal_bl: The speed at which entities are launched horizontally
The number of particles spawned when an entity is moving through the cloud
The number of particles spawned when an entity is static in the cloud
config.simple_aether_cloud.red_cloud.dam: The amount of damage dealt to entities each time
config.simple_aether_cloud.red_cloud.par: The number of particles spawned when an entity takes damage
config.simple_aether_cloud.green_cloud.a: The range at which animals are attracted to the cloud
config.simple_aether_cloud.green_cloud.m: The minimum distance animals must be from the cloud to be attracted
config.simple_aether_cloud.green_cloud.a: The speed at which animals move towards the cloud
config.simple_aether_cloud.green_cloud.t: The multiplier for timer progress (higher values make timers progress faster)
